name: undescribable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
impossible to describe, especially because of being extremely good or bad: I wonder if their dishes come close to the undescribable perfection of France. There’s quite an undescribable thrill about being up in a balloon. Synonym
indescribable
More examplesFewer examplesThey both felt an undescribable love for the tiny new being in her arms.Some of my greatest moments, some of the undescribable moments, were spent with him high up in the mountains.She felt an undescribable panic rise up inside of her.
